string.name: menu_title
string.translation_description: The label for the menu item.

string.name: my_shopping_cart_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'My shop cart' screen where the user can see the list of items that have been added to their shop cart.

string.name: item_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the item list screen where the user can see a list of items available to add to their shop cart.

string.name: shop_cart_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'My shop cart' screen when no items have been added to the user's shop cart

string.name: add_item
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the available list to add items to their empty shop cart.

string.name: added_item_to_shop_cart
string.translation_description: Confirmation text that is shown when a user adds an item to their empty shop cart.

string.name: added_config
string.translation_description: Confirmation text that is shown when a user adds config for the Wallee Portal.

resources.string: Configuration for the Wallee Portal added

string.name: add_config
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to add config.

resources.string: Wallee Portal configuration is not present. Please provide user id, space id and authentication key.
